description: CustomBuildStrategy defines input parameters specific to Custom build.

from.description: from is reference to an DockerImage, ImageStreamTag, or ImageStreamImage from which the docker image should be pulled

secrets.description: secrets is a list of additional secrets that will be included in the build pod

exposeDockerSocket.description: exposeDockerSocket will allow running Docker commands (and build Docker images) from inside the Docker container.

env.description: env contains additional environment variables you want to pass into a builder container

pullSecret.description: pullSecret is the name of a Secret that would be used for setting up the authentication for pulling the Docker images from the private Docker registries

buildAPIVersion.description: buildAPIVersion is the requested API version for the Build object serialized and passed to the custom builder

forcePull.description: forcePull describes if the controller should configure the build pod to always pull the images for the builder or only pull if it is not present locally
